website_summaries.verdict: A nice, mid-range priced kamado grill that has roomy cook space and some other nice features in addition to a few quality concerns.
pros: Offers 2 solid bamboo shelves that fold down easily for maneuvering and storing the grill
Has dual tiered cooking racks with ample space for preparing lots of your favorite foods at once
cons: Exterior paint has been known to chip or peel
Vents feel a bit on the flimsy side, and occasionally allow air to leak – resulting in irregular temperatures while cooking

customer_reviews.title: Gap in Lid
customer_reviews.text: This grill was awesome for about a month. I have owned it for little over a year or more. After a month or so the hinge stopped working right so it left a gap in between the top and bottom. I contacted warranty and got another hinge to be sent. The hinge literally took almost a year to get to me. It was never in stock then had to be shipped from the manufacturer but it took over a year! That was with multiple emails a month. Well I just installed the new hinge and approximately one month later it develops the same gap in the lid 😂. What a joke. I wouldnt recommend any pit boss stuff.
customer_reviews.author: James pose

customer_reviews.title: Quality & beauty, love it
customer_reviews.text: The first one was delivered with a broken firebox:-(. But, Amazon jumped right to it, and sent a replacement. Amazingly it was delivered not broken, although as rough as the delivery company was, I was shocked. Silent Laborers came and assembled it (they are the best!), and the grill is stunning. My husband loves it, and all the features. He is used to egg cooking, so he plans to fire it up this weekend. Update: My husband has used this grill countless times, as we grill/smoke often. He says it has even temperature control, holds a steady temp for a long, long time. He LOVES it! It smokes flawlessly. I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its been great using this cooker. I'd give it 5 starts but the felt liner on the top of the ceramic edge came off after the first use. That's the only negative so far. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one years ago...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this Kamado cooks, bakes, smoke and grills. I love infusing the food with smoke. It is so tasty. The only complaint that I have is the air vent on the bottom did not close good enough and the daisy wheel vent on the top leaked smoke even when closed. I put a gasket around the back side of the sliding vent door and gasket around the inside sealing edge to the daisy wheel vent and solved the problem. I have recommended this Kamado to relatives and have complete confidence that they will love one if they make the purchase. The only bad thing for me is the price dropped $70 right after I bought it...
customer_reviews.author: R. Parr

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ive made in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect!! I had to seal it up a little better by purchasing some of the felt gasket, but after I did that was able to maintain temps of 225-245. That pork shoulder took 10 hours and never got over 245.
customer_reviews.author: Frankenstein

customer_reviews.title: Nice budget large-size Kamado
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good grill. It's harder to keep a low temperature than they let on. The lower vent is so loose and floppy that it lets in a lot of air even when fully shut. It's easily solved with a bit of hammering ... just to make the vent fit up against the grill more. Works great for doing lots of burgers and dogs. Works awesome with my dutch oven. Smoking with it is pretty easy, too, once you get the low temp figured out.
customer_reviews.author: ericaz

customer_reviews.title: steaks and ribs are amazing. You can't do this with gas
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new grill but was tired of gas grills. I was excited to try this but I gotta say get 2 strong friends to help assemble Used hardwood charcoal and by the second use my wife calls me the pit boss. Chicken, steaks and ribs are amazing. You can't do this with gas. I'm bragging to all my friends and they all want to try my food. I just tell them to bring some meat and I'll do the rest. This thing is amazing, easy and fast
customer_reviews.author: William Leon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in all regards
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high quality grill / cooker. Takes a few times to get the temp correct, as the ceramic gets very hot, so as your fire builds you have to start adjusting the vents closer to slow down the fire. This will slow the temp increasing. Once stabilized - it cooks perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought this grill long ago. The egg was out of my budget. This grill has been fabulous for slow cooking pork butts and grilling steaks. You can't beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Medley

customer_reviews.title: Essential Summer Cooker
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our smaller Kamado with a 22" Pit Boss Kamado Grill. The features are Nice but the price was Nicer! The double level grill has makes it more easy to cook for large parties and grilled meats are tender, moist and flavorful.

customer_reviews.title: Missing one part

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Parts Delivered
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with the purchase is one of the metal brackets that hold the wooden side boards is the wrong one and now I don't know how I'm going to get it replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great item that could be better with a few small details
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and assembled it. Overall looks great and I am eager to try it. The base is high quality and easy to assemble, and the grill itself has a good finish and sturdy construction. The literal weakness (hence only 3 stars) is the hardware which mounts the side tables to the grill. The brackets are of poor quality metal, they do not readily fit as intended, and one marked LB was rusty and instantly cracked and broke as I tried to mount it. Photo included. Assuming Amazon or the manufacturer chooses to provide replacement brackets for mounting the side tables, I will upgrade my rating to 4 stars to recognize good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TAMJS

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing grill! We have been 100% happy with it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing grill! We have been 100% happy with it and would recommend it to anyone looking at ceramic grills!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. I was skeptical because of the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I was skeptical because of the price and free installation, I was surprised at how heavy it is and the use of quality hardware. The air flow door could have been made better, not quite the same as the BGE. No cover included.

customer_reviews.title: amazing Grill

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker, Best chicken I've ever had made on it .
customer_reviews.author: J McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Delivered last week. Took about and hour to set up. Very solid. First thing I did was season the Pit Boss with a 400 degree fire for an hour. Then I shut it down. Today, I cooked my first brisket. I must have put in too much wood as even with the bottom vent closed and the top vent cracked to only 1/8”, I couldn’t get the temp to hold below 275 to 300 degrees. With that being said, my 7 pound brisket was cooked in 8 hours and it is by far the best brisket I have ever cooked. Only complaint is the design of lower door. Even when closed, it allows air to draw. Need to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: kim johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broken

customer_reviews.text: Not able too Rate it. It arrived damaged, waiting another 3 weeks hopefully it's not damaged

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by the Pit Boss 71220 Charcoal Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Just finished assembling the Pit Boss 71220 Ceramic Charcoal Grill and I have to say, the fit and finish are exceptional for this price point. I ordered extra felt and high temperature silicone to enhance the cooking chamber temperature control, but I felt this was a small amount of time and cost to enhance a really good cooker. I also replaced the thermometer, as coming from a Weber Smokey Mountain Cooker, that was often a weak point in another great cooking system. As the owner of a Kamado Joe Jr., I have to say that the Pit Boss gives it a run for the money, at a cost several hundreds less.
customer_reviews.author: powered by mac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome got it Costco 599
customer_reviews.text: Awesome got it Costco 599.00 can't beat the price did what another did made hooks and bought grill from Home Depot and I can sear stakes and it is a great smoker 👍
customer_reviews.author: Harold L. Wurmnest

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker after a few mods to seal it up.
customer_reviews.text: Got this at walmart on clearance. Really is a great cooker. I would suggest adding gasket material on the bottom damper and sealant around that hole. Also adding a second layer of gasket material around the top hole. If you google search you will find youtube video on it and forum threads. It only should cost $20 to do all that. After doing this thing cooks and cool down like a BGE. Really cannot say enough good thing about this cooker!
customer_reviews.author: A. Walters

customer_reviews.title: The thermometer stopped working after a couple months after moderate ...
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer stopped working after a couple months after moderate use. I left messages via email and voice mail with Pit Boss customer service a few weeks ago and haven't received a response. A defective part should be rectified without going through a hassle.

product_meta.title: Pit Boss 71220 Kamado BBQ Ceramic Grill Cooker, 22"
product_meta.description: Size:22-InchThe Pit Boss Kamado charcoal ceramic cooker makes it easy for any aspiring outdoor chef to produce "World Class BBQ Your Own Backyard". You will marvel at the quality, versatility and beauty of this modernized version of an ancient Asian cooker. Designed and built to last but priced to fit anyone's budget, the Pit Boss Kamado is an all-in-one charcoal cooker with the versatility to perfectly cook just about anything in any way. Abundant and naturally produced charcoal heat is encapsulated in the kamado's thick ceramic walls, and radiates into your food, locking in moisture and enhancing the flavor and thanks to the thermal efficiencies, you will maximize the burn efficiencies of each lump of charcoal. Using the calibrated cooking vents for superior temperature control, you can slow smoke ribs, bake pizza, roast turkey, grill burgers, char vegetables, or sear your steak, just like any world class chef or pit master. The Pit Boss Kamado provides an impressive 567sq inches of 2 tier cooking surface and features high-quality solid stainless steel cooking grid, perfect for entertaining friends and family. Heavy duty hardware, wood handle and springs help make the heavy lid easy to lift and hold in position, plus there is a fire proof felt edge and a shock absorber to guide and protect the lid. Dual folding wooden shelves provide more than amble space to hold your mouth watering fare, then fold easily to make storage compact and easy. More and more outdoor enthusiasts, foodies, and world class "Pit Masters" are discovering the difference of cooking in a Pit Boss Kamado. Enjoy the world of culinary possibilities using your Pit Boss Kamado Ceramic Cooker.
feature_bullets: Featuring a heavy ceramic body the kamado is the ideal environment for efficiently burning charcoal
The cast iron top tamper gives you full control over air flow allowing you to set the perfect cooking temperature
The solid bamboo side shelves are sturdy and fold down for easy storage
Dual tier cooking grates provide even more space to make the most of the encapsulated heat
